New features ( help index )
What`s new in this version of eSQLManager?

eSQLManager v1.0 includes many new features and improvements over it`s predecessors. The complete sourcecode was rewritten for version 1.0 to assure stability and scalability.

A list of the most important new features in eSQLManager:

- new interface for managing database connection profiles
- new interface for binary data up and download
- new import+export interface
- new datalimit options
- new interface for managing indexes
- new interface which allow advanced users to manage the JDBC drivers
- improved interface for creating tables and tablecolumns
- improved application speed and stability
- and many more...

Known issues

Indexes interface
The Fulltext checkbox is not selected when viewing a fulltext index.

Down/Uploading binary data
The progress indicator doesnot show the down/upload status correct.

Edit table
Displays a nullpointer when running in console-mode (not critical).
